description: This file contains the implementation of enemy AI and entity logic for a platformer game, specifically managing enemy behaviors such as patrol movement for 'slime' enemies and a factory method for creating enemy instances based on type. It includes classes and functions for updating enemy states each game tick, supporting future extension to other enemy types.

classes.name: WalkerSlime
classes.description: Represents a simple patrol (walker) enemy that moves horizontally between boundaries, turning upon hitting patrol limits.

methods.name: Constructor
methods.description: Initializes a WalkerSlime instance with position, direction, patrol boundaries, and speed.

methods.name: update(dt)
methods.description: Updates the enemy's position based on its speed and direction, reversing course when reaching patrol boundaries.

methods.name: createEnemyInstance(data)
methods.description: Factory function that creates enemy objects based on type data, currently supporting 'walker' type.

methods.name: updateEnemies(enemiesState, dt)
methods.description: Per-tick updater that iterates through all enemy objects and calls their update method if it exists.
